name: Norwegian Association Against Noise
membership:
Noregian association for health and envirnment
Network with other organisations Bellona, Friends of he Earth, Greenpeace, Norwegian acoustic association
goal:
The Norwegian Association Against Noise, founded in 1963, is a politically independent environmental organization receiving financial support from the Ministry of Environment/The Norwegian Climate and Pollution Agency.
Our goal is to prevent and reduce environmental noise, contribute to better quality of life, and improve health, by participating in public hearings, national information campaigns and advisory to the local authorities and public in general.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Environmental noise directive, regulations concerning car industry, other mobility poducts, transport, house qualities, evironmental noise legislation regarding all issues that affects daily life
